title: Digital Content Grant (DCG) – Marketing & Commercialisation Grant
description: Supports marketing and commercialisation of digital content products. Ceiling: RM300,000. Duration: up to 9 months.
sector: Digital Content (Animation, Games, Creative Technology, Digital Comics)
eligibility: Companies incorporated ≥1 year, ≥51% Malaysian equity, min share capital RM20,000, Malaysia Digital or MSC status. Cannot be broadcaster/OTT/media company. Must not be current MDEC/FINAS/MyCreative Venture grant recipient. One year cooling off for past MDEC grantees.
requiredDocs: Marketing plan, deal letters (LOI from broadcasters/investors/publishers), company docs, declarations of relationships/legal proceedings, evidence of pitching sessions.
